CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Expansion_Type__c ,"Add-on"),(CloseDate - Account.Customer_as_of__c)<185), "Quick Expansion", IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( Expansion_Type__c,"New product"),(CloseDate - Account.Customer_as_of__c)<185), "Quick Expansion", IF(ISPICKVAL(Expansion_Type__c,"Add-on"),"Expansion", IF(ISPICKVAL(Expansion_Type__c,"New product"),"Expansion", TEXT( Expansion_Type__c ) ))))
CustomField.label: Check Commission Type
